reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson explains complex concepts clearly and is always willing to help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen's passion for coding is contagious. Challenging but rewarding classes.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson knows her stuff, but the pace of the class can be overwhelming at times.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and thought-provoking discussions. Prof. Martinez brings history to life.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Kim is an exceptional educator. Her research-based approach and real-world examples are invaluable.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's teaching style is too abstract. More practical examples would help.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Gonzalez's enthusiasm makes it enjoyable. Great lab sessions.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor's knowledge is vast, but his grading can be inconsistent and harsh.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's classes are a perfect blend of theory and real-world applications. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures. Prof. Lee encourages critical thinking and lively debates.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting content, but Dr. Adams could improve on making the material more engaging.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's balanced approach to controversial topics is commendable. Fair and knowledgeable.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Liu's passion for art is infectious. Her lectures are like taking a journey through time.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Green makes complex environmental issues accessible. Great field trips and hands-on projects.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. White is knowledgeable, but the course structure could use some improvement.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Davis brings real-world experience to the classroom. His insights are invaluable.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez's fieldwork experiences enrich her lectures. Challenging but rewarding course.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. O'Brien's teaching style is too rigid. More flexibility in assignments would be appreciated.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Sanchez is at the forefront of her field. Her classes are demanding but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Peterson knows his subject well, but could work on making the material more accessible to non-math majors.
